content:
Create Custom CSS Within the FlexCard Designer

Create custom CSS classes within the FlexCard Designer to apply to FlexCard elements or supported fields inside elements. The custom CSS is a Salesforce attachment that updates when the FlexCard is saved.

From the FlexCards tab, select the FlexCard to update.
In the Style panel, click Add Custom CSS.
Enter your custom classes in the code editor.
(Optional) Enable Load as Global CSS.
Click Save.

Apply custom CSS classes to elements. See Apply Custom CSS to a FlexCard Element.

Add Custom CSS properties are configurable from the submenu of the FlexCard Designer. Create custom CSS classes and add them to supported fields in the Properties and Style panels.

SEE ALSO

Style FlexCard Elements
title: Creating Custom CSS for FlexCards
